title: Un Kannai Partha Piragu Lyrics Yuvan Yuvathi Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Karthik, Ramya
Song: Un Kannai Partha Piragu 
Lyrics: Priyan 
Music : Vijay Antony
Movie:  Yuvan Yuvathi

Un Kannai Partha Piragu, 
En ulle lacham siragu
Un oara paarvai asaivil manam kudai saayum
Ne vandhu poana piragu, thalaikelaai maarum ulagu
Un illam irukum thisayil thiriyudhu en paadham

Thanneeril aadum aalaiyai, kaatrodu midhakum illayaai
En Manadhum maarukindradhe, unadhaai
Sila neram migavum sugamaai, Sila neram migavum summayaai
Ayyo kadhal paduthu kindrathe, pudhidhaai

Un Kannai Partha Piragu, En ulle lacham siragu
Un oara paarvai asaivil manam kudai saayum

Adi unnai pol pennai engum kandadhillai
Indru varai en manadhai yaarume eerthathillai ..hOh oh... 
Un udhadu endhan perai sollum neram
Silirkiren thavikiren envasam naanum illai ..hOh oh... 
Mazhai nindra podhum kilaigal,siru thooral poduvadhu pol
Ne kadandha piragum ninaivil, irupaai

Un Kannai Partha Piragu, En ulle lacham siragu
Un oara paarvai asaivil manam kudai saayum

Ennai vittu ullam undhan pinnal sellum
Thadukiren thavirkiren idhayamum, ketkavaillai .. ovuhoh..oh
Naan indru pola endrum sokkiponathillai
Idharkumun enakindha paravasam, paindhadhillai .. ovuhoh..oh
Ne netru engu irundhai, en nenjil indru nulaindhal
Ini naalai enna avasthai, purivaai

Un Kannai Partha Piragu, En ulle lacham siragu
Un oara paarvai asaivil manam kudai saayum
Ne vandhu poana piragu, thalaikelaai maarum ulagu
Un illam irukum thisayil thiriyudhu en paadham

Thanneeril aadum aalaiyai, kaatrodu midhakum illayaai
En Manadhum maarukindradhe, unadhaai
Sila neram migavum sugamaai, Sila neram migavum summayaai
Ayyo kadhal paduthu kindrathe, pudhidhaai
